text:
I'm looking for a freelancer to work on some technical blog posts covering migrating from Slack to Microsoft Teams (and vice versa). We'd also need to cover Microsoft Teams to Webex (and vice versa).

Ready to start and provide briefs for mid Jan.

text:
:rotating_light: we have two new jobs on the superpath job board today! :rotating_light:
• *ActiveCampaign / <@UJ7RT1J1X> is hiring a <https://superpath.co/job/11076-senior-manager-editorial-activecampaign|Senior Manager, Editorial>.* You’ll manage two employees, run an editorial calendar & collaborate across the rest of the marketing. I interviewed Benyamin about the role here: <https://superpath.co/job/11076-senior-manager-editorial-activecampaign>
• *Scribewise is hiring a <https://superpath.co/job/11075-senior-account-executive-content-marketing-scribewise|Senior Account Executive, Content Marketing>*. You’ll split your time between content creation, content strategy, and client account management. This means you are thinking about the full spectrum of content—who it’s for, how it’ll get there, why it’s being created and who’s paying for it. and you get to work with <@U01CF4F0A6T> and <@U01AF7P3C5Q> :grinning: I interviewed founder John Miller about the role here: <https://superpath.co/job/11075-senior-account-executive-content-marketing-scribewise>

text:
I'm hiring for a junior content strategist to join me and my team at Builtvisible in London.
It's a great opportunity for anyone with a bit of experience in content/SEO who is looking to dive in to agency life and learn the ropes by working on global accounts alongside a team of experts, cheerleaders and mentors: <https://builtvisible.com/careers/content-strategy-executive/>

text:
<https://outplayhq.com/|Outplay> (An Indian SaaS startup) is looking for a couple of content marketers (full-time).

Location - India (remote)

Here's the JD: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1qKNnf2D22UMVyS6CV7C8qA7BBjcd5kiyudJXmaUoZos/edit?usp=sharing>

Reach out to the co-founder - Laxman on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/laxmanpapineni/|LinkedIn> & let him know the CMCG reference.

Thanks,

attachments.title: Sales Engagement Platform - Outplay
attachments.text: Outplay is a sales engagement platform that offers sales outreach, dialer, email open tracking, email click tracking, and many more features for sales teams to close deals faster.

text:
If you’re a technical writer or like/love writing about data-related topics, I’ve got 2 really good opportunities at early-stage startups building the next gen. of dev tools in the customer data space. Both are remote positions and will pay well for the right candidate. DM me with some writing samples if you’re interested. For reference, <https://dataled.academy/customer-data-platform/|this is the kind of content> we’re looking for.

Plz just note that prior experience writing about data is not necessary as long as you think you can learn the ropes quickly. And I can assure you that you will learn a lot!

attachments.title: What is a Customer Data Platform? | The Definitive Guide
attachments.text: Read this guide to learn in simple terms what really is a Customer Data Platform and whether you need to adopt one or not.
attachments.fallback: data-led academy: What is a Customer Data Platform? | The Definitive Guide
